<Meta title="Design Language/New project setup" />

# New project setup

When starting a new project, the default styles of Gousto should be imported. This will:

* import normalize.css
* set `box-sizing: border-box` as default
* set generic colors for anchors

## Importing generic styles

At the root of your React app (e.g. `App.js` or `index.js`), add the following:

```
import from 'goustouicomponents/dist/design-language/general-setup.module.css'
```
